values: 写；书写；写信；记录；写道；写入（数据）；写作；作曲；创作；承保（保险单）；开（支票等）；填写（表格等）；好使；能使用

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 书写；作品；著作；[法] 笔迹

word_group.brief_definition: 读和写；读写；阅读和写作
写到；记述；写关于...的文章
详细记叙；正式报道；将（日记等）写到目前为止
自定计划；自己规划前程
在（选票上）加写（非原定候选人）的名字；投（非原定候选人）的票
自定计划；自己规划前程
不值得大书特书的；不十分好的；平庸的
word_group.phrase: be nothing to write home about

bilingual.source: Let's write about a famous person in the past!
bilingual.target: 让我们写一写过去的名人吧！

bilingual.source: I will write in it every day!

list.abstract: write是一个Unix命令行程序和内建指令，功能是写到一文件中，用法是int write(int handle, void *buf, int nbyte)。
write，英语单词，主要用作动词，作及物动词时意思是“写，书写；写信给；著述”，作不及物动词时意思是“写，写字；写作，作曲；写信”。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? Did you write it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？是你写的？

yingyinNormal.en: Here's 10 bucks. Write me better. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给你十块钱，把我写好点。好嘞。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll have to get you to write that one down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可能得写下来给我看才行。

yingyinNormal.en: You write uncommonly fast, Mr Darcy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你写信写得这样快，真是少见，达西先生。

yingyinNormal.en: You're mistaken. I write rather slowly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这话可说得不对，我其实写得相当慢。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd write that down, but I can't now, can I?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我本来可以写下来，但现在不行了？

yingyinNormal.en: I forgot. Damn it, Mom! Write it down next time!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我忘记了。去你的，妈妈！下次写下来！

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. I write for a site called "hit the road."
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，我在给一个叫“在路上”的网站写稿子。

yingyinNormal.en: That's very pretty, Dolores. Did we write that for you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那很美，徳洛丽丝，那是我们预先写好的程序吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Here. In case you need something to write with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给你，如果你需要支笔写字。

yingyinNormal.en: What's going on? Riley made us write on our heads!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是怎么回事？莱丽让我们在自己额头上写字！

yingyinNormal.en: Do you trust me? Or don't you? Because if you don't, get someone else to write it. Or write it yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你信任我吗，还是不信任？你如果不信任我，就另找人写吧，或者你自己写。

yingyinNormal.en: You need to write a reply to Zoe to tell her you are coming to her party. Can you help us write it, Mummy? Of course.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你需要给佐伊写一封回信告诉她你们会去参加派对。你可以帮我们写吗，妈妈？当然可以啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, that's not how you write a thank you card. What's wrong with it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，感谢函不是这么写的。我写的有哪里不对？

yingyinNormal.en: You know, like write a play. Write a movie. I mean, what about those Good Will Hunting guys?
yingyinNormal.zh: 例如写个戏剧或者电影剧本，就像《心灵捕手》里的那两个角色。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't write. you know I mean I'm an actor, I could act like a writer, you know. But see? Nada.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会写剧本，我是演员，我可以装成编剧，不过什么也写不出来。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you write the report? No. No. We all discussed what to say. We all wrote it together. She wrote. She wrote the report. She was in charge. Is that true? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这报告是你写的吗？不，不，我们一起讨论了报告该怎么写。然后所有人一起写的。她写的报告，她是主管。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if you have a problem with it, why did you write it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然你对这个有意见，为啥不写个投诉信。

yingyinNormal.en: Which tells us what? That I need to write you more solos?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这告诉我们什么？我需要为你写更多的独唱？

yingyinNormal.en: You will write the details of your next of kin. On that bag.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们还要在那个袋子上写上自己亲人的资料。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执笔者；撰写人；撰稿人；作家；作曲家；著者；作曲者；抄写员；记录器
v. 重写；改写；修改
v. 写；书写；（write的过去分词）
n. 写作；写作技能；著作；字；字迹；书法；笔迹；著书；写作的职业；作品

word_family.mean: v. 写；书写；写…给；写作；编著；用文字形式表达；写入；承保；写字；函告

examination_example.sentence: Critically, another group was asked to spend a minute <highlight>writing</highlight> down reasons for their judgment, before giving the rating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至关重要的是，另一组被要求花一分钟写下他们判断的理由，然后再给出评级。

examination_example.sentence: You should <highlight>write</highlight> at least 150 words.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该写至少150个字。

examination_example.sentence: Do not <highlight>write</highlight> the address.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要写地址。

examination_example.sentence: "The ancient Hawaiians were astronomers," <highlight>wrote</highlight> Queen Liliuokalani, Hawaii's last reigning monarch, in 1897.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “古代夏威夷人是天文学家，”夏威夷最后一位在位君主Liliuokalani女王在1897年写道。

examination_example.sentence: "Readers must have confidence in the conclusions published in our journal," <highlight>writes</highlight> McNutt in an editorial.
examination_example.sentence_trans: McNutt在一篇社论中写道:“读者必须对我们杂志上发表的结论有信心。”

examination_example.sentence: "The history of all hitherto existing society is the history of class struggles," <highlight>wrote</highlight> Marx and Engels in The Communist Manifesto.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马克思和恩格斯在《共产党宣言》中写道:“迄今为止所有现存社会的历史都是阶级斗争的历史。”

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Write</highlight> him/her an email to make some suggestions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给他/她写一封电子邮件，提出一些建议。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Write</highlight> an email to answer the inquiry from an international student volunteer, specifying the details of the project.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 写一封电子邮件来回答一名国际学生志愿者的询问，详细说明项目的细节。

examination_example.sentence: Suppose you won a translation contest and your friend, Jack, <highlight>wrote</highlight> an email to congratulate you and ask for advice on translation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设你赢得了一场翻译比赛，而你的朋友杰克写了一封电子邮件来祝贺你，并向你寻求翻译方面的建议。

examination_example.sentence: None of this is about <highlight>writing</highlight> off the individual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些并不是为了抹杀个人的力量。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执笔者；撰写人；撰稿人；作家；作曲家；著者；作曲者；抄写员；记录器
v. 重写；改写；修改
n. 写作；写作技能；著作；字；字迹；书法；笔迹；著书；写作的职业；作品

word_family.mean: v. 写；书写；写…给；写作；编著；用文字形式表达；写入；承保；写字；函告

examination_example.sentence: I did <highlight>write</highlight> that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我确实这么写了。

examination_example.sentence: I'll <highlight>write</highlight> down exactly what I'm going to say and read it carefully.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会把我要说的话一字不差地写下来，仔细阅读。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Write</highlight> down the names of all the American states you can remember.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 写下你能记得的所有美国州的名称。

examination_example.sentence: Economist Jessica Irvine <highlight>wrote</highlight> a book about how she used math to help her lose more than 18 kilograms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经济学家Jessica Irvine写了一本书，讲述了她如何利用数学帮助自己减掉超过18公斤的体重。

examination_example.sentence: Examine types of sentences they use, and focus on stories you feel you could <highlight>write</highlight> a pretty cool sequel to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 检查他们使用的句子类型，关注那些你觉得可以写一个极好的续集的故事。

examination_example.sentence: It enables one to <highlight>write</highlight> intriguing sequels to famous stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它使人能够为著名的故事写出引人入胜的续集。

word_usage.usage: write作动词，表“书写”，既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。
write with表示“用…工具写”，write in表示“用…材料写”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执笔者；撰写人；撰稿人；作家；作曲家；著者；作曲者；抄写员；记录器
v. 重写；改写；修改
v. 写；书写；（write的过去分词）
n. 写作；写作技能；著作；字；字迹；书法；笔迹；著书；写作的职业；作品

word_family.mean: v. 写；书写；写…给；写作；编著；用文字形式表达；写入；承保；写字；函告

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Writing</highlight> him thank-you notes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给他写感谢信。

examination_example.sentence: So are you fast at <highlight>writing</highlight> the messages with your thumb?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么你用拇指写信息的速度快吗？

examination_example.sentence: You should <highlight>write</highlight> at least 120 words but no more than 180 words.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你至少应该写120个单词，但不能超过180个单词。

examination_example.sentence: For this part, you are allowed 30 minutes to <highlight>write</highlight> an essay titled "Is technology making people lazy?".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一部分，你有30分钟的时间写一篇题为“科技是否让人变懒？”的文章。

examination_example.sentence: For this part, you are allowed 30 minutes to <highlight>write</highlight> an essay on online dictionaries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一部分，你有30分钟的时间写一篇关于在线词典的文章。

examination_example.sentence: For this part, you are allowed 30 minutes to <highlight>write</highlight> an essay on online libraries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一部分，你有30分钟的时间写一篇关于在线图书馆的文章。

word_usage.usage: write with表示“用…工具写”，write in表示“用…材料写”。
write作动词，表“书写”，既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执笔者；撰写人；撰稿人；作家；作曲家；著者；作曲者；抄写员；记录器
v. 重写；改写；修改
v. 写；书写；（write的过去分词）
n. 写作；写作技能；著作；字；字迹；书法；笔迹；著书；写作的职业；作品

word_family.mean: v. 写；书写；写…给；写作；编著；用文字形式表达；写入；承保；写字；函告

examination_example.sentence: Before there was the <highlight>written</highlight> word, there was the language of dance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早在文字出现之前，就有了舞蹈语言。

examination_example.sentence: Keep track of your efforts and <highlight>write</highlight> down how you feel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记录你的努力，写下你的感受。

examination_example.sentence: For each of those gardens, <highlight>write</highlight> down the strongest memory you have.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 写下你对于每一个花园最深刻的记忆。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>wrote</highlight> my poems in this manner for nearly ten years before my first book was published.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我的第一本书出版之前，我用这种方式写了将近十年的诗。

examination_example.sentence: HamiltonLin-Manuel Miranda <highlight>wrote</highlight> this musical about Alexander Hamilton, in which the birth of America is presented as an immigrant story.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汉密尔顿林·马努艾尔·米兰达写了这部关于亚历山大·汉密尔顿的音乐剧，在这部音乐剧中，美国的诞生被描述为一个移民故事。

examination_example.sentence: We are bringing together artists, to enjoy speaking Shakespeare's plays in their own language, within the architecture Shakespeare <highlight>wrote</highlight> for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将聚集艺术家，用他们自己的语言来讲述莎士比亚的戏剧，就在莎士比亚曾为之写作过的建筑中。

examination_example.sentence: I was so excited when he <highlight>wrote</highlight> back to me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他给我回信的时候我太激动了。

examination_example.sentence: A company representative <highlight>wrote</highlight> back and told me the airline was switching over from plastic to paper cups.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位公司代表回信告诉我，该航空公司在从塑料杯转向纸杯。

examination_example.sentence: One of the biggest companies I <highlight>wrote</highlight> to was Alaska Airlines Paris.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我写信的几家公司中，最大的就是巴黎的阿拉斯加航空。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 书写; 写字; 填写

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 读和写；读写；阅读和写作
写到；记述；写关于...的文章

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执笔者；撰写人；撰稿人；作家；作曲家；著者；作曲者；抄写员；记录器
v. 重写；改写；修改
adj. 未写下的；无文字记录的；未成文的；惯例的；因袭的
v. 写；书写；（write的过去分词）
n. 写作；写作技能；著作；字；字迹；书法；笔迹；著书；写作的职业；作品

word_family.mean: v. 写；书写；写…给；写作；编著；用文字形式表达；写入；承保；写字；函告

examination_example.sentence: After the task of <highlight>writing</highlight> the speech is complete, speakers must practice, practice, practice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 完成撰写演讲稿的任务后，演讲者必须练习、练习、再练习。

examination_example.sentence: People in modern times can read the classic works which were <highlight>written</highlight> by Chinese in ancient times．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现代人可以阅读古代中国人撰写的经典作品。

examination_example.sentence: By the year 2000, Rupert was already working as a reporter, <highlight>writing</highlight> articles and guidebooks about Africa and India.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至2000年，鲁珀特已经成为一名记者，撰写关于非洲和印度的文章和指南。

sense_info_list.zh: 书写; 写字; 填写

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Writing</highlight> about bad feelings can also help brains get over them and move on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 写下不好的感受，也可以帮助大脑克服它们，继续前进。

examination_example.sentence: An agreement is worthless till our name is <highlight>written</highlight> with a pen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非用笔写下我们的名字，否则协议毫无价值。

examination_example.sentence: It was with a pen that the greatest thinkers of all time <highlight>wrote</highlight> down their thoughts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有史以来最伟大的思想家就是用笔写下他们的思想的。

examination_example.sentence: It has collected eighty-five letters <highlight>written</highlight> by students in Beijing to young people in pandemic-stricken (疫情重创下的) countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它已经收集了85封信，由北京学生写给疫情重创国家的年轻人。

examination_example.sentence: Thanks for your message and I am glad that you <highlight>wrote</highlight> to me for ideas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谢谢你的留言，我很高兴你写信向我征求意见。

examination_example.sentence: It's my pleasure to <highlight>write</highlight> you this letter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很高兴给你写这封信。

examination_example.sentence: Abing, a folk musician who/that was born in the city of Wuxi in 1893, <highlight>wrote</highlight> the music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Abing，一位1893年出生于无锡市的民间音乐家，创作了这首曲子。

examination_example.sentence: The song was <highlight>written</highlight> by two sisters from Kentucky, Mildred and Patty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这首歌是由来自肯塔基州的两姐妹米尔德里德和帕蒂谱写的。

examination_example.sentence: Although there were no pianos in Yan'an at that time, Xian still <highlight>wrote</highlight> some of his most important music there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然当时延安没有钢琴，但冼仍然在那里创作了一些他最重要的音乐。

word_usage.usage: write作动词，表“书写”，既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。
write with表示“用…工具写”，write in表示“用…材料写”。
